query: UPDATE videoGenerationJobs SET status = 'pending', errorMessage = NULL, updatedAt = NOW() WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ENKfpgkx2S962Xx.root --database NYSDZ3CUp62WRWmJyXH7Fz --execute UPDATE videoGenerationJobs SET status = 'pending', errorMessage = NULL, updatedAt = NOW() WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1
